docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate Majority PAC is buying $3 million in ads in five states in an attempt to counter the big spending of two powerful Republican donors.

headline.main: Democrats Plan Ads in Challenge to Koch Brothers
headline.print_headline: Democrats Plan Ads in Challenge to Koch Brothers

docs.abstract: Senate Majority PAC, which supports Democratic Senate candidates, is preparing a $3 million advertising campaign against Charles G Koch and David H Koch, libertarian-minded billionaire brothers who support conservative causes and have already poured millions of dollars into the 2014 midterm elections.
docs.snippet: The Senate Majority PAC is buying $3 million in ads in five states in an attempt to counter the big spending of two powerful Republican donors.
